Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.ads.listener

Interface DynamicAdListener

  • public interface DynamicAdListener
    An interface to listen the dynamic ad events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ViewGroup getAdContainer()
      This method will be called to get the container view to show the banner ad.
      Context getAdContext()
      Returns the context used by this listener.
      long getAdEventCount()
      This method will be called to get the ad event event count.
      boolean isAdEnabled()
      This method will be called to detect if the ads are enabled for this listener.
      void onAdDisplay​(com.google.android.gms.ads.AdView adView)
      This method will be called when the ad view is loaded.
      void onAdDisplay​(com.google.android.gms.ads.interstitial.InterstitialAd interstitialAd)
      This method will be called when the interstitial ad is ready to be shown.
      void onAdDisplay​(com.google.android.gms.ads.nativead.NativeAd nativeAd, View parent, com.google.android.gms.ads.nativead.NativeAdView adView)
      This method will be called when the native ad is ready to be shown.
      void onAdEvent()
      This method will be called when an ad event has occurred.
      void resetAdEventCount()
      This method will be called to reset the ad event count.
      void setAdEventCount​(long eventCount)
      This method will be called to increment the ad event count.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdContext

        @NonNull
Context getAdContext()
        Returns the context used by this listener.
        Returns:
        The context used by this listener.

      • isAdEnabled

        boolean isAdEnabled()
        This method will be called to detect if the ads are enabled for this listener.
        Returns:
        true if the ads are enabled for this listener.

      • getAdEventCount

        long getAdEventCount()
        This method will be called to get the ad event event count.
        Returns:
        The ad event count.
        See Also:
        DynamicAd.PREFS, DynamicAd.Key.EVENT_COUNT

      • setAdEventCount

        void setAdEventCount​(long eventCount)
        This method will be called to increment the ad event count.
        Parameters:
        eventCount - The ad event count to be set.
        See Also:
        DynamicAd.PREFS, DynamicAd.Key.EVENT_COUNT

      • resetAdEventCount

        void resetAdEventCount()
        This method will be called to reset the ad event count.
        See Also:
        DynamicAd.PREFS, DynamicAd.Key.EVENT_COUNT

      • onAdEvent

        void onAdEvent()
        This method will be called when an ad event has occurred.
        See Also:
        setAdEventCount(long)

      • getAdContainer

        @Nullable
ViewGroup getAdContainer()
        This method will be called to get the container view to show the banner ad.
        Returns:
        The container view to show the banner ad.

      • onAdDisplay

        void onAdDisplay​(@NonNull
                 com.google.android.gms.ads.AdView adView)
        This method will be called when the ad view is loaded.
        Parameters:
        adView - The loaded ad view.

      • onAdDisplay

        void onAdDisplay​(@NonNull
                 com.google.android.gms.ads.interstitial.InterstitialAd interstitialAd)
        This method will be called when the interstitial ad is ready to be shown.
        Parameters:
        interstitialAd - The loaded interstitial ad.

      • onAdDisplay

        void onAdDisplay​(@NonNull
                 com.google.android.gms.ads.nativead.NativeAd nativeAd,
                 @Nullable
                 View parent,
                 @Nullable
                 com.google.android.gms.ads.nativead.NativeAdView adView)
        This method will be called when the native ad is ready to be shown.
        Parameters:
        nativeAd - The loaded native ad.
        parent - The optional parent view.
        adView - The optional native ad view.
